text: La Chapelle-Gaugain is a former commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Sarthe department in the west of France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the new commune of Loir en Vallée.Arrêté préfectoral 16 December 2016 == References == Category:Former communes in Sarthe
title: La Chapelle-Gaugain
